v1.0.0      Don Spaulding   <donspauldingii@gmail.com>
            Added packaging info to Shane Hathaway's initial daemon.py.

v1.0.1      Don Spaulding   <donspauldingii@gmail.com>
            Fixed MANIFEST file to point to all packaging files.

v1.1.0      Don Spaulding   <donspauldingii@gmail.com>
            Assume .conf file is named the same as the subclass' module.
            Allow specifying log rotation parameters in .conf file.

v1.2.0      Massimiliano Torromeo   <https://bitbucket.org/mtorromeo>
            Allows simpledaemon to be used on Python 3 after a 2-to-3 run
            over the codebase.

v1.2.1      Don Spaulding   <donspauldingii@gmail.com>
            Adds tests.  Moar PEP8.  Better README.

v1.3.0      Don Spaulding   <donspauldingii@gmail.com>
            simpledaemon now supports both Python 2.X and 3.X out
            of one codebase.
